input.sentences: but he could n't figure out why he had no friends .
output.sentences: Chad Bungleworth was a typical college athlete.
Between each semester he'd drive out to the suburbs to visit his grandparents, he was always so well mannered at their house.
Chad played many sports but was most passionate about cycling and was working toward the Tour De France.
His grandparents were so proud of his achievements, they were always so happy to brag about their rising star.
During one of his visits Chad finally told them he was gay and, being the ultra conservative crazies that they were, they asked him to leave.
